original_text: So Israel yoked himself to Baal of Peor. And the anger of the Lord was kindled against Israel.
korean_text: 이스라엘이 바알브올에게 가담한지라 여호와께서 이스라엘에게 진노하시니라

sentences.original_text: So Israel yoked himself to Baal of Peor.
And the anger of the Lord was kindled against Israel.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 여호와의 진노가 이스라엘을 향하여 타올랐다.
